TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed VbStrConv extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Indicates which type of conversion to perform when calling the `StrConv` function.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When you call the `StrConv` function, you can use the following enumeration members in your code in place of the actual values. The argument takes the `VbStrConv` enumeration members.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.VbStrConv Hiragana = int32(32)

Docs.summary: Converts Katakana characters in the string to Hiragana characters. Applies to Japanese locale only. This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant `vbHiragana`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.VbStrConv Katakana = int32(16)

Docs.summary: Converts Hiragana characters in the string to Katakana characters. Applies to Japanese locale only. This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant `vbKatakana`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.VbStrConv LinguisticCasing = int32(1024)

Docs.summary: Converts the string from file system rules for casing to linguistic rules. This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant `vbLinguisticCasing`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.VbStrConv Lowercase = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Converts the string to lowercase characters. This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant `vbLowerCase`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.VbStrConv Narrow = int32(8)

Docs.summary: Converts wide (double-byte) characters in the string to narrow (single-byte) characters. Applies to Asian locales. This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant `vbNarrow`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.VbStrConv None = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.VbStrConv ProperCase = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Converts the first letter of every word in the string to uppercase. This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant `vbProperCase`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.VbStrConv SimplifiedChinese = int32(256)

Docs.summary: Converts the string to Simplified Chinese characters. This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant `vbSimplifiedChinese`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.VbStrConv TraditionalChinese = int32(512)

Docs.summary: Converts the string to Traditional Chinese characters. This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant `vbTraditionalChinese`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.VbStrConv Uppercase = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Converts the string to uppercase characters. This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant `vbUpperCase`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.VbStrConv Wide = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Converts narrow (single-byte) characters in the string to wide (double-byte) characters. Applies to Asian locales. This member is equivalent to the Visual Basic constant `vbWide`.
